zh-CN: 支持用户跳过登陆配置模型使用AI能力
终端中rz/sz命令支持
支持Shift+Tab快捷键切换AI对话模式
新增Maple Mono字体支持
命令输出结果OUTPUT区域新增主机IP显示标记
修复Vim可视化编辑器显示不全问题
优化AiTab页面缩放和多Tab切换体验
自定义背景内容国际化支持
优化若干问题，提升应用稳定性
en-US: Support user skip login to configure model to use AI ability
Support rz/sz commands in terminal
Support Shift+Tab shortcut key to switch AI conversation mode
Add Maple Mono font support
Add host IP display mark in the OUTPUT area of the command output results
Fix the problem of Vim visual editor display not fully problem
Optimize the AiTab page zoom and multi-Tab switching experience
Custom background content internationalization support
Optimize some issues and improve the application stability

zh-CN: 修复上传自定义的背景图片失败问题
堡垒机资产列表获取不全问题修复
AI对话多tab保存和显示对应的对话模式和AI模型
降低终端输入延迟
支持Command+Shift+P快捷键进行主机搜索
优化本地连接分屏功能
en-US: Fix the problem of uploading custom background images failed
Fix the problem of getting all the assets in the jump server list
AI conversation multi-tab save and display the corresponding conversation mode and AI model
Reduce the terminal input delay
Support Command+Shift+P shortcut key to search for hosts
Optimize the localhost split-screen feature

zh-CN: 支持自定义的背景图片和系统默认背景
重构终端分屏功能
重构快捷命令功能
新增版本功能更新提示
设置中新增终端触摸板缩放功能
支持对AI对话的中断操作
支持对AI对话的任务内容导出分享
支持XShell，SecureCRT导出的文件数据导入
Terminal和Agents布局切换相关功能优化
优化若干问题，提升应用稳定性
en-US: Support custom background images and system default background
Refactor the split-screen feature
Refactor the shortcut command feature
Add a new version update reminder feature
Add a new terminal touchpad zoom feature in the settings
Support interrupt the AI conversation
Support export the AI conversation task content and share
Support XShell, SecureCRT exported file data import
Optimize the Terminal and Agents layout switching related features
Optimize some issues and improve the application stability

zh-CN: 加强AI模型的选择和测试中的调试过程
在选项卡菜单中增加了内部分屏显示的选项
en-US: Enhance AI model selection and debugging process in tests
Added the option for inner split-screen display within the tab menu

zh-CN: 支持jms令牌
添加了SSH连接身份
en-US: Support jms token
Added SSH connection identity
